Hdyras,

Hydras opened his com link to Azure and said "Go to the base and get 
contact with Perceptor, he would know what to do" after that he 
opened com link with Chimeara"Chimera, wher're you ???? do something 
useful and move to this cordinates: IF I DON'T SEE YOU HERE IN FEW 
CYCLES i'LL PERSONALY KILL YOU!!!"

Hydras landed next to SharpClaws and Wolfstein and Roared"What are 
you expecting fools, that UNICRONS MINIONS ARRIVE???? OPEN FIRE 
AGAINST THOSE PIECE OF METAL!!!!"

Perceptor
Received the com link and looking to StarFlier he said "Proces can 
continue alone, babe, just keep an eye in him and told me when he's 
ready to fight"

PErceptor run the base defences and started to sunk the base inside 
the volcano. If Asure liked came in he had to be hurry.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Robo, Airly, this is your cue to take a squad and bash some 
> bolts!
> 
> Bic:
> 
> Unicron's propulsors came to a step as he settled in the Moon's 
> orbit. He stood there, watching the energon-bloated jewel that was 
> Earth. He zoomed his malevolent attention on the three 
Cybertronian 
> bases and decided that these were the objectives. A low roar arose 
> as he began to speak. His voice would be transmitted all over the 
> planet.
> 
> Unicron: I claim this planet as mine. Any Transformer on it will 
be 
> destroyed unless they choose to become my servants. Also, if you 
> part with the Matrix, I may spare your spark.
> 
> The Transmission ended abruptly. The Chaos Bringer turned to his 
> many Minions.
> 
> Unicron: We will attack in waves. Kill all you find, unless they 
> offer their alliegeance. Sky-Eye, find Bloodblade.
> 
> The first squad, the Flaming Eye of Morgoth (hint hint!), left on 
> that instant for Predacon base. They were Firewhip, Klash, 
> Crumblefish, Sky-Eye and the big Ragebomber. They would be there 
> soon...
